thread.section_title: Maine Lobster Now Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Maine Lobster Now | www.mainelobsternow.com
thread.title: profitjk
thread.title_full: Maine Lobster Now reviewed by profitjk

author: profitjk
title: profitjk
text: My wife's health is not good. We were reminiscing about long ago when we would fly from Florida to Boston and enjoy a meal of fresh Maine lobster. She can no longer travel so I ordered a pair of your 2 pound lobsters, chose the delivery day and enjoyed a fabulous "date night" right at home. They were alive and kicking when they arrived & it was a fabulous meal. Cooking instructions were easy for our cook/server to follow (our daughter). My wife has few things to smile about these days but this did the trick. Thank you!
